The person also answered three purely qualitative questions about their concept of self. The person was asked, "Please describe the type of person you aspire to be. That is, write about the traits and behaviors you would like ideally to possess, your ultimate goals for yourself. Please write at least 3 sentences." They answered: "I would like to be a less selfless person {that is in thought} someone who has a little more patience and self control. My tendency to be selfish is the most important thing for me because even though I would do anything for my family my initial thoughts are to not do anything at first in my brain."
